title: Imperfect Love Story
description: 5… The number of years since I’ve been home.4… The number of people who know my secret.3… The number of times I attempted to move on.2… The number of months I spent crying after I left.1… The number of men I’ll love in my lifetime. They say everyone has one true love, one person who was made just for them. A person they were meant to spend the rest of their life with.The thing about life… it doesn’t always go as planned.
author: Rachael  Brownell
